data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Oslo, Norway.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Oslo, Norway
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Oslo, Norway.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 697,100 people living in Oslo.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Oslo, Norway to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, Norwegian-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 697,100 people living in Oslo, Norway. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Oslo, Norway to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Oslo, Norway.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

location.name: Oslo
location.people_groups_list: Albanian, Tigre, Eritrean, Thai, Arab, Iraqi, Arab, Syrian
